alert.note: Alert for Northern Westchester; Orange; Putnam; Rockland; Southern Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 11:50PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Fairfield, Westchester, northeastern Orange, Putnam and Rockland Counties through 1230 AM EDT... At 1150 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Walden to White Plains. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stamford, Danbury, White Plains, Newburgh, Ossining, Peekskill, New Canaan, Haverstraw, Tarrytown, Mount Kisco, Mahopac, Lake Carmel, Walden, West Point and Sherman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Westchester; Orange; Putnam; Rockland; Southern Westchester
